$interpreted: Dylan: Good, it seems that they got away...
Sione: Let me go!
Dylan: Only problem now is how to deal with witnesses...
Dylan: You're... the girl from this morning! Sione Aldric?
Sione: Now's our chance!
Sione: Dylan Levon!
Sione: As Colonel, how could you let that disguised culprit escape with the hostage?
Dylan: That wasn't a disguise. He is indeed Royal Infantry, one of my men.
Sione: How come...
Dylan: You just heard their conversation, didn't you? You don't find anything weird about all this?
Sione: I...
Dylan: What kind of hostage would sacrifice herself to protect the person who kidnapped her?
Sione: Then, those two are really...
Dylan: Yes, they really are in love with each other.
Sione: ...They've run off to elope? B-But the lady is the bride of today's engagement party...
Dylan: Which is why my subordinate had to resort to such vulgar tactics.
Dylan: No man could just sit and watch his beloved woman be forced into a political marriage like this.
Sione: This marriage was organized by His Majesty Theodore himself. You are disobeying his direct orders.
Sione: I have to report this back to His Majesty.
Dylan: I won't stop you.
Dylan: But I would like you to leave their private matters out of the report so his Majesty won't vent his anger on their respective families.
Sione: Aren't you... worried about yourself?
Dylan: The well-being of my men comes before my own. It's my responsibility as Colonel to ensure that.
Sione: ...Understood. What happened today shall remain a secret.
Dylan: ...Are you sure? This is disobeying King Theodore's direct orders.
Sione: I am a noble. I know the pain of political marriage...
Sione: If that girl were one of my sisters, I would have done the same.
Dylan: I understand. It seems like you are indeed the person I was looking for.
Dylan: Time to put an end to my crappy acting.
Sione: You were pretending to lose to me...? Why?
Dylan: I wanted to know more about you. To see if you're suitable to be the Princess' personal bodyguard.
Sione: Princess? Do you mean Princess Angelia?
Dylan: I've been looking for some time, but I just couldn't find the right person.
Dylan: Until I met you this morning.
Sione: But I just joined the army. I'm a rookie...
Dylan: Experience doesn't matter. You're loyal, yet don't blindly follow orders.
Dylan: You understand justice. You're exactly who I've been looking for.
Dylan: Sione Aldric, will you accept this assignment as the Princess' bodyguard?
